[[File:Cherubim (Earth-616) from Captain Britain Vol 2 7 001.png|175px|left|thumb|The original look of the Cherubim]]
===First steps===
The Cherubim is a government team constituted of the [[Warpies (Race)|mutated children]] [[Quill (Warpies) (Earth-616)|Quill]] (the official leader), [[Fern (Earth-616)|Fern]] (the real leader), [[AC-DC (Earth-616)|AC-DC]], [[Giggles (Earth-616)|Giggles]], [[Lump (Warpies) (Earth-616)|Lump]] and the [[Cherub Whirlwind (Earth-616)|Cherub Whirlwind]]

Formed in the rank of the numerous [[Warpies (Earth-616)|Warpies captured]] by the [[Resources Control Executive (Earth-616)|R.C.X]], they were intended to be used by [[Michael (RCX) (Earth-616)|Michael]] and [[Matthew (Gabriel) (Earth-616)|Matthew]] as a threat to persuade [[Brian Braddock (Earth-616)|Brian Braddock]] to put the [[Braddock Manor]] and the [[Mastermind (Computer) (Earth-616)|Mastermind Computer]] at their service.{{r|Captain Britain Vol 2 8}}
 
Freed from their containment van by [[Meggan Puceanu (Earth-616)|Meggan]], they attacked the Manor but were defeated after [[Lump (Warpies) (Earth-616)|Lump]] use his power to shows to [[Brian Braddock (Earth-616)|Captain Britain]], [[Linda McQuillan (Earth-238)|Captain U.K.]] and [[Elizabeth Braddock (Earth-616)|Elizabeth Braddock]] their greatest nightmares : [[James Jaspers (Earth-616)|Mad Jim Jaspers]] and the [[Fury (Earth-238)|Fury]], giving to them the strength to win.

Meggan have evolved from her monster-form, discovering new powers and killing [[Cherub Whirlwind (Earth-616)|Cherub Whirlwind]]. While the Warpies were eventually accepted in the Manor, the Cherubim went rogue, scared of the consequences of their acts.{{r|Captain Britain Vol 2 9}}

===The [[Parasites (Earth-616)|Parasites]]===
They ended at [[London (England)|London]] where they destroyed a toys store and were reported to the R.C.X. by the police.{{r|Captain Britain Vol 2 11}}

Approached by the Warpies [[Spasm (Earth-616)|Spasm]] and [[Peeping Tom (Earth-616)|Peeping Tom]], they were recruited into the thieves gang known as the [[Parasites (Earth-616)|Parasites]], led by "[[James Christian (Earth-616)|Uncle Lex]]".{{r|Captain Britain Vol 2 13}}

After the death of one of them, [[Snap (Warpies) (Earth-616)|Snap]], they decided to quit, but not after having be forced to battle with Uncle Lex's Warpies.{{r|Captain Britain Vol 2 14}}

===Return to [[Resources Control Executive (Earth-616)|R.C.X]]===
They reappeared at [[Nigel Orpington-Smythe (Earth-616)|Nigel Orpington-Smythe]]'s service, attacking and abducting [[Scott Wright (Earth-616)|Scott Wright]], the [[Homo superior|mutant]] known as [[Micromax]] for the R.C.X. They also participated in the massive fight in the [[Cloud Nine (Earth-616)|Cloud Nine]] complex against [[Excalibur (Earth-616)|Excalibur]].{{r|Excalibur Vol 1 63|65}} 

===Back to human===
The Warpies were later abducted and mutated by [[Black Air (Earth-616)|Black Air]] and then used as weapons by the robot [[Mastermind (Computer) (Earth-616)|Mastermind]] under the guise of [[Roma (Otherworld)|Roma]], who tried to take control of [[Otherworld]], destroying a lot of the [[Captain Britain Corps (Multiverse)|Captain Britain Corps]] members. The Cherubim were used as Mastermind's elite corps.

[[File:Cherubim (Earth-616) from Excalibur Vol 2 4 0001.png|380px|left|thumb|The Cherubim back to human]]

The robot was eventually defeated by the newly formed Excalibur, and Captain Britain was appointed Otherworld's new leader and he used his powers and Excalibur sword to cure all Warpies present, included the Cherubim. The Warpies were now ordinary human children again.{{r|Excalibur Vol 2 2|4}}

It is unknown were the Cherubim and the other Warpies goes after that, if they stayed on Otherworld or went again on [[Earth-616]].
